code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Container,Box,Grid,Button,Typography,Paper}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Calculator=()=>{const[display,setDisplay]=useState('');const handleButtonClick=value=>{if(value==='='){try{setDisplay(eval(display).toString());}catch{setDisplay('Error');}}else if(value==='C'){setDisplay('');}else{setDisplay(display+value);}};const buttons=['7','8','9','/','4','5','6','*','1','2','3','-','0','.','=','+','C'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"flex justify-center items-center h-screen bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{elevation:3,className:"p-4 w-80",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",className:"text-center mb-4",children:"Calculator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{className:"mb-4 p-2 bg-white text-right text-2xl border border-gray-300 rounded",children:display}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:1,children:buttons.map((btn,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:3,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",fullWidth:true,className:"h-16 text-xl",onClick:()=>handleButtonClick(btn),children:btn})},index))})]})});};export default Calculator;
